CustomField.description: Users populate this optional field to indicate the new monthly income of all treasury products an FI originates outside of nCino net of any ECR allowance. By default, it isâ€¯blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The additional monthly income of all treasury products (net of ECR) in the deal that an FI originates outside of nCino.
CustomField.label: New Monthly Treasury Income
